title: (x) Stilla / anything similar - various {gang}
content:
Was going to get   
   
   
 [STILLA](http://web.archive.org/web/20051126090600/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/stilla/)   
   
   
but wanted to see if there are any   
other/better digitizations ...   
   
or anything else similar.   
   
any help appreciated,   
   
bj
author: bjharvey

comments.content:
Thanks Tiffany and Mike. I love Fluidum.   
   
I guess I was seeking out something more   
in the direction of a Fat Face with ball terminals.   
   
Pistilli Roman is nice, too.

It's not uncommon to see Stilla on book covers when you   
browse at used bookstores.   
   
I just figured there would be other digitizations and wanted   
to be informed. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20051126090600im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
Thanks.

Wow, I had no idea that Middleton did Stilla. He was   
responsible for most of Ludlow's library. I didn't know he   
had done anything beyond that.
Not really very similar but ... [Annlie Extra Bold Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20051126090600/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/annlie/extra-bold-italic/)

Here are some crummy digital pictures of Stilla from a book published in 1976.   
   
   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20051126090600im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/22767.jpg)   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20051126090600im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/22768.jpg)   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20051126090600im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/22769.jpg)   
Looks like three alternates\_   
   
the ampersand, the T, and the M.
I like [Cabernet](http://web.archive.org/web/20051126090600/http:/www.veer.com/results.asp?Image=JBT0000060). I think the swash bits are yummilicious.

I found this sample in the 1980 spanish Letraset Catalog. Yes, there are few more alternates.   
   
 ![Stillas](http://web.archive.org/web/20051126090600im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/22790.jpg)

Ignacio, this is wonderful, thanks!   
   
bj

Couldn't agree more. Thanks everyone.   
   
   
bj
